languages.text: Рыдающий от счастья старик поклялся, что будет ежедневно молиться о здоровье нового Лорд-капитана. История о его чудесном приключении и преданной службе моментально облетела корабль.
The sobbing old man swears to pray daily for the good health of the new Lord Captain. The story of his amazing adventure and selfless service immediately spreads throughout the ship.
languages.original_text: Рыдающий от счастья старик поклялся, что будет ежедневно молиться о здоровье нового Лорд-капитана. История о его чудесном приключении и преданной службе моментально облетела корабль.

traits.locale_text: The sobbing old man has sworn to pray daily for the good health of the new Lord Captain. The story of his amazing adventure and selfless service has spread throughout the ship instantly.
The sobbing old man has sworn to pray daily for the good health of the new Lord Captain. The story of his amazing adventure and selfless service has spread throughout the ship instantly.

The sobbing old man swears to pray daily for the good health of the new Lord Captain. The story of his amazing adventure and selfless service immediately spreads throughout the ship.

languages.text: Entre lágrimas, el anciano jura rezar a diario por la salud de su nuevo Lord Capitán. La historia de su increíble aventura y su servicio abnegado se extiende por toda la nave de inmediato.
languages.original_text: The sobbing old man swears to pray daily for the good health of the new Lord Captain. The story of his amazing adventure and selfless service immediately spreads throughout the ship.

traits.locale_text: Entre lágrimas, el anciano jura rezar a diario por la salud de su nuevo Lord Capitán. La historia de su increíble aventura y su servicio abnegado se extiende por toda la nave de inmediato.

languages.text: 老人は泣きじゃくって、新しいロード・キャプテンの安全を毎日祈ることを誓った。男の驚くべき冒険話と献身的に仕えた話は、たちまち船中に広まった。
languages.original_text: The sobbing old man swears to pray daily for the good health of the new Lord Captain. The story of his amazing adventure and selfless service immediately spreads throughout the ship.

traits.locale_text: 老人は泣きじゃくって、新しいロード・キャプテンの安全を毎日祈ることを誓った。男の驚くべき冒険話と献身的に仕えた話は、たちまち船中に広まった。

languages.text: 老人感动得热泪盈眶，发誓每天都会为新任领主舰长的健康祈祷。他惊人的冒险故事以及无私奉献的可贵精神，很快就传遍了整艘旗舰。
languages.original_text: The sobbing old man swears to pray daily for the good health of the new Lord Captain. The story of his amazing adventure and selfless service immediately spreads throughout the ship.

traits.locale_text: 老人感动得热泪盈眶，发誓每天都会为新任领主舰长的健康祈祷。他惊人的冒险故事以及无私奉献的可贵精神，很快就传遍了整艘旗舰。

languages.text: Der schluchzende alte Mann schwört, täglich für die Gesundheit des neuen Lord Captains zu beten. Die Geschichte seines unglaublichen Abenteuers und selbstlosen Dienstes verbreitet sich wie ein Lauffeuer auf dem Schiff.
languages.original_text: The sobbing old man swears to pray daily for the good health of the new Lord Captain. The story of his amazing adventure and selfless service immediately spreads throughout the ship.

traits.locale_text: Der schluchzende alte Mann schwört, täglich für die Gesundheit des neuen Lord Captains zu beten. Die Geschichte seines unglaublichen Abenteuers und selbstlosen Dienstes verbreitet sich wie ein Lauffeuer auf dem Schiff.

languages.text: Entre deux sanglots, le vieil homme jure de prier chaque jour pour {mf|le nouveau seigneur-capitaine|la nouvelle seigneure-capitaine}. Très vite, le récit de son incroyable aventure et de son sacrifice est connu de tous sur le vaisseau.
languages.original_text: The sobbing old man swears to pray daily for the good health of the new Lord Captain. The story of his amazing adventure and selfless service immediately spreads throughout the ship.

traits.locale_text: Entre deux sanglots, le vieil homme jure de prier chaque jour pour {mf|le nouveau seigneur-capitaine|la nouvelle seigneure-capitaine}. Très vite, le récit de son incroyable aventure et de son sacrifice est connu de tous sur le vaisseau.
